backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, clue uploads, and answer generation with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human‑written summaries of various frontend source files for build or documentation reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML app entry defining meta tags, PWA manifest links, icons, and script bootstrapping.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, runtime caching, and network-first navigation for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, profile setup, clue uploads, and optional custom riddle input.
frontend/src/components/AnswerGeneration: Component for generating an AI answer using riddle text and image clue IDs, handling validation, mutation calls, and UI state.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header bar showing the app logo, optional PWA install button, and authentication controls.
Manages uploading audio files as riddle clues with progress tracking, queue state, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Displays authentication state and provides sign‑in/sign‑out functionality via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Landing view showing a welcome message, illustration, and steps to start using the app.
Handles uploading image clue files with progress, queue management, and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog prompting the user to enter and save their name to complete profile setup.
Provides a UI for selecting, queueing, uploading, and managing video clue files with progress tracking and status feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, stored identities, and provides context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Tracks PWA installability, handles beforeinstallprompt, and exposes a method to trigger installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, media clues, and generated answers via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for a warm detective-style UI.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Formats principal IDs by shortening them with a prefix and suffix around an ellipsis.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, color variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing and pending feature requests, and known issues for the Riddle Solver app.
